name: Never Meet Your Heroes
description: Taking advantage of the temporal anomaly crisis, Starfleet hosts a conference to unite greats from across space-time with their adoring fans, but as is custom in this galaxy, nothing goes smoothly! Will you be able to keep the fan-demonium in check?
rules:
-- Unique Bajoran, Klingon, and Terran Empire Faction Missions are available during the event. Open the Event to access them.
-- Using T. Paris, Boimler, Barclay, or Cultural Figures will provide a bonus to Event Faction Missions.
-- Every Event Faction Mission you succeed at earns you Event Victory Points. Collect Victory Points to unlock Event Threshold Rewards.
-- In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
bonus_text: Crew Bonus: T. Paris, Boimler, Barclay, or Cultural Figures
rewards_teaser: Reach Rank 1 by gaining Victory Points from Event Missions!

featured_crew.name: Azetbur
featured_crew.flavor: As the daughter of Chancellor Gorkon, she succeeds him after his assasination and will do anything to accomplish the future he yearned for.

featured_crew.name: Boimler
featured_crew.flavor: Get your “Voy” Collector’s Plate ready ‘cause Captain Proton and the creator of Fair Haven, Lt. Tom Paris, will be visiting the Cerritos!

action.name: Fine, You Want to Play It That Way?

featured_crew.name: Barclay
featured_crew.flavor: Barclay is thrilled at the opportunity to meet the inventor of the warp drive himself, Zefram Cochrane.

rewards.name: Bajoran Transmission
rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Bajoran faction missions.

rewards.name: Klingon Empire Transmission
rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Klingon Empire faction missions.

rewards.name: Terran Empire Transmission
rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Terran Empire faction missions.

rewards.name: Merits
rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.name: 10x S. Shuttle
rewards.flavor: 10 Standard Boosts. Go to Time Portal to collect!

rewards.name: Paris
rewards.flavor: Flight Controller of the U.S.S. Voyager, he was haunted by his past in the Maquis and on the U.S.S. Exeter.

rewards.name: Bajoran Transmission
rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Bajoran faction missions.

rewards.name: Klingon Empire Transmission
rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Klingon Empire faction missions.

rewards.name: Terran Empire Transmission
rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Terran Empire faction missions.

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

rewards.name: Credits
rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

rewards.name: Merits
rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: Tokens
rewards.flavor: Requisition Shuttle Tokens grant access to an additional Shuttle to use for a single Faction Mission.

rewards.name: Reward Multiplier
rewards.flavor: (Shuttle Missions Only) 2x rewards.

rewards.name: Credits
rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

rewards.name: Honor
rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Voyage Revival
rewards.flavor: Use to instantly revive a failed Voyage.

rewards.name: 10x Portal
rewards.flavor: 10 valuable items. Go to Time Portal to collect!

rewards.name: Azetbur
rewards.flavor: As the daughter of Chancellor Gorkon, she succeeds him after his assasination and will do anything to accomplish the future he yearned for.

rewards.name: Barclay
rewards.flavor: Barclay is thrilled at the opportunity to meet the inventor of the warp drive himself, Zefram Cochrane.

rewards.name: Rarity
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 5 Polestars: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Super rare, Legendary

rewards.name: Skill
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 6 Polestars: Command, Diplomacy, Security, Engineering, Science, Medicine

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.name: Dilithium
rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Merits
rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: Azetbur
rewards.flavor: As the daughter of Chancellor Gorkon, she succeeds him after his assasination and will do anything to accomplish the future he yearned for.

rewards.name: Barclay
rewards.flavor: Barclay is thrilled at the opportunity to meet the inventor of the warp drive himself, Zefram Cochrane.

rewards.name: Rarity
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 5 Polestars: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Super rare, Legendary

rewards.name: Skill
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 6 Polestars: Command, Diplomacy, Security, Engineering, Science, Medicine

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

potential_rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

goals.flavor: Bring together Starfleet legends with the Bajorans.
Keep up appearances with the Klingon Empire.
Tame the crowds with the Terran Empire.

screens.text: "Good to hear from you, Captain. I take it you'll be at the Conference? Great chance for us to boost morale across Starfleet. A lot of up-and-comers are excited to mee--"

"It's you! Ah, uhm, Mr. Paris, uh, sir! Can I just say, when you broke the Warp 10 barrier, that was incredible, I mean, lizard thing aside and all. Can I get your autograph later? Keeping this conference together has been easier said than done."
"Haha, I know how you feel, ensign. Getting to meet Zephram Cochrane wasn't something I ever expected to happen, but when it did, I was just as tongue-tied as you."
You may not be able to help with the awkwardness of meeting one's hero, but maybe you can give us a hand with the conference nuts and bolts, Captain?"
